metadata.title: Mongolia Economic Forum - MEF 2025
metadata.description: The Mongolia Economic Forum (MEF) was established in 2010 as a non-governmental, non-profit organization to create a premier discussion platform for open, evidence-based dialogue on Mongolia's long-term development.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Mongolia's Premier Economic Platform
about.description: The Mongolia Economic Forum (MEF) was established in 2010 as a non-governmental, non-profit organization to create an independent platform for open, evidence-based dialogue on Mongolia's long-term development.

missionDriven.title: Mission-Driven
missionDriven.description: Creating an independent platform for open, evidence-based dialogue on Mongolia's long-term development.

multiStakeholder.title: Multi-Stakeholder
multiStakeholder.description: Convening leaders from government, business, academia, and civil society to discuss key priorities.

international.title: International Reach
international.description: Connecting Mongolian stakeholders with global institutions, investors, and development partners.

actionOriented.title: Action-Oriented
actionOriented.description: Aligning on practical solutions and policy recommendations that drive real change.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: Since its founding, the Forum has convened leaders from government, business, academia, and civil society to discuss key economic and social priorities and to align on practical solutions.
vision.paragraph2: We bring together representatives from government, the private sector, research institutions, civil society, and international organizations to support policy-oriented dialogue and collaborative action.

missionMn.title: Зорилго
missionMn.description: Монголын Эдийн Засгийн Форум (МЭЗФ) нь 2010 онд байгуулагдсан ба төрийн бус, ашгийн төлөө бус, улс төрөөс хараат бус байгууллага бөгөөд Монгол Улсын урт хугацааны хөгжлийн бодлого, эдийн засаг, нийгмийн тулгамдсан асуудлаар нээлттэй, хэлэлцүүлэг өрнүүлэх бие даасан талбар байх зорилготой.

timeline.label: History
timeline.title: 15 Years of Impact
timeline.description: From our founding in 2010 to today, MEF has consistently brought together leaders to address Mongolia's most pressing economic challenges.

board.label: Board of Directors
board.title: Leadership
board.description: Meet the distinguished leaders guiding the Mongolia Economic Forum.

ganhuyag.name: Ganhuyag Chuluun Hutagt
ganhuyag.position: Chairman of the Board, Ard Financial Group

whyParticipate.label: Why Participate
whyParticipate.title: Why Join MEF?
whyParticipate.description: Discover the unique opportunities the Mongolia Economic Forum offers to participants.

1.title: Engage with Decision-Makers
1.description: The MEF provides a unique platform where business leaders, academics, civil society, and citizens can interact directly with the Prime Minister, government leaders, Parliament representatives, and policy makers.

2.title: Solution-Driven Dialogues
2.description: The Forum's agenda focuses on strategic priorities such as economic policy, investment climate, financial markets, green transition, digitalization, and infrastructure—creating a space for honest and outcome-oriented dialogue.

3.title: International Connections
3.description: With regular participation from the Asian Development Bank, World Economic Forum, global companies, and foreign investors, MEF offers exceptional opportunities to build regional and international partnerships.

4.title: Latest Insights & Trends
4.description: Plenary and side sessions deliver updated data, analysis, and perspectives on Mongolia's development policy, sustainable growth, green energy, mining, agriculture, innovation, and more.

5.title: Policy Impact
5.description: MEF does more than discuss—its outcomes are consolidated into practical recommendations and shared with government and stakeholders, ensuring participants influence real policy processes.

6.title: Expand Your Network
6.description: With over 2,000 participants, the Forum brings together leaders from diverse sectors, offering high-value networking and collaboration opportunities.

7.title: Shape Mongolia's Future
7.description: Your participation contributes directly to national dialogue on Mongolia's long-term development—with every voice playing a role in shaping a shared future.

gallery.label: Gallery
gallery.title: Moments from MEF
gallery.description: Explore highlights from past Mongolia Economic Forum events.

partners.label: Partners
partners.title: Our Partners & Sponsors
partners.description: We are grateful to our partners and sponsors who make the Mongolia Economic Forum possible.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about the Mongolia Economic Forum.

what.question: What is MEF?
what.answer: MEF is a national policy platform where government, private sector, academia, civil society, and international organizations openly discuss Mongolia's economy and development policy.

who.question: Who can participate?
who.answer: Government agencies, private sector leaders, entrepreneurs, researchers, university faculty and students, international organizations, investors—anyone who wants to share their views on Mongolia's development issues.

importance.question: What is the significance of participating?
importance.answer: Engage directly with decision-makers; participate in solution-driven dialogues; connect with international institutions and investors; access the latest insights and trends; contribute to actionable policy recommendations; expand your professional network; and help shape Mongolia's future.

topics.question: What are the main topics discussed at the Forum?
topics.answer: Each year's forum focuses on different topics based on current policy priorities. Examples include: economic policy and development planning, green development and energy transition, digital transition and smart cities, investment climate, mining and agricultural diversification, financial markets and credit ratings, etc.

where.question: Where is the Forum held?
where.answer: The Forum is held at multiple locations in Ulaanbaatar depending on the annual program, topics discussed, and participant profiles. Main and side sessions have traditionally been held at the State Palace, city center conference halls, Chinggis Khaan Museum, Shangri-La Hotel Ulaanbaatar, and Galleria Ulaanbaatar.

register.question: How to register?
register.answer: Official registration takes place through the MEF website and open announcements. As seating is limited, advance registration is required.

fee.question: What is the registration fee?
fee.answer: Domestic participant fee is ₮1,000,000, foreign participant fee is $500. Payment details may be updated depending on the year's organization decisions.

foreigners.question: How can foreign participants join?
foreigners.answer: Foreign delegates are welcome through invitations, diplomatic channels, organizational representation, and international partnerships.

language.question: What languages are used at the Forum?
language.answer: The main sessions are held in both Mongolian and English with simultaneous interpretation.

government.question: Is MEF a government event?
government.answer: No. MEF is a politically independent, non-profit, non-governmental organization. The participation of the Prime Minister and policy makers has become a tradition to strengthen public-private cooperation.

sponsor.question: How can I become a sponsor?
sponsor.answer: Sponsors and strategic partners can contact the MEF team directly to discuss partnership packages and opportunities.

contribute.question: Can I contribute at the Forum?
contribute.answer: Yes. Participants' opinions, statements, and positions are used through breakout sessions and Q&A segments to develop policy recommendations.

nextYear.question: How can I get information about next year's forum?
nextYear.answer: Information is regularly updated through MEF's official website, social media pages, and news channels.

results.question: Where are the Forum results published?
results.answer: Summaries of plenary and breakout sessions, recommendations, policy proposals, photos, and videos are published on official channels after the forum.

mongolia.title: About Mongolia
mongolia.description: Learn about the land of the eternal blue sky.

contact.description: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you.

footer.description: The premier platform for dialogue on Mongolia's economic development, bringing together leaders from government, business, and civil society since 2010.
